reuters.title: GROUP SELLS MOST OF STAKE IN CCX INC <CCX>
reuters.body: A shareholder group including Far Hills, N.J. attorney Natalie Koether said it reduced its stake in CCX Inc common stock to 10,000 shares, or less than one pct of the company's common stock outstanding, from a previous stake of about ten pct. In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the group said it sold 380,000 CCX common shares on October 15 at four dlrs a share. The group gave no reason for the sales. Reuter 
